title: Day 32 - Aftermath
itunes:title: Day 32 - Aftermath
itunes:subtitle: The Bad Days
description:
Some crimes fade into the realm of legend, but what happens to the people involved? What happens next in lives that have been touched by terror?

***

Written by Brian Nisonger

***

Please consider supporting the podcast at Patreon.com/Creepypod or creepypod.com/support

***

Sound design by Steve Blizin

***

Title music by Alex Aldea

***

Intro/Outro Narration by Joe Stofko
